iBase_EntityHandle  edge_handle,
double  x,
double  y,
double  z,
double *  cvtr_i,
double *  cvtr_j,
double *  cvtr_k,
int *  err 
)

Get the principle curvature vector for an edge at a point.

Get the principle curvature vector for an edge at a point. Magnitude of vector is the curvature, direction is direction of principal curvature.

Parameters:
instance  [in] iGeom instance handle
edge_handle  [in] Edge being queried
x  [in] Position being queried
y  [in] Position being queried
z  [in] Position being queried
cvtr_i  [out] Maximum curvature vector
cvtr_j  [out] Maximum curvature vector
cvtr_k  [out] Maximum curvature vector
err  [out] Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)

void iGeom_getEntArrCvtrXYZ ( iGeom_Instance  instance,
const iBase_EntityHandle *  entity_handles,
int  entity_handles_size,
int  storage_order,
const double *  coords,
int  coords_size,
double **  cvtr_1,
int *  cvtr_1_allocated,
int *  cvtr_1_size,
double **  cvtr_2,
int *  cvtr_2_allocated,
int *  cvtr_2_size,
int *  err 
)

Get the curvature(s) on an entity(ies) at given position(s).

Get the curvature(s) on an entity(ies) at given position(s). If either the number of entities or number of coordinate triples is unity, then all points or entities are queried for that entity or point, respectively, otherwise each point corresponds to each entity. storage_order should be a value in the iBase_StorageOrder enum; if input as iBase_UNKNOWN, order is in native order with respect to implementation.

Parameters:
instance  [in] iGeom instance handle
entity_handles  [in] Entity(ies) being queried
entity_handles_size  [in] Number of entities being queried
storage_order  [in] Storage order of coordinates
coords  [in] Starting coordinates
coords_size  [in] Number of values in coordinates array
cvtr_1  [in,out] First principal curvatures
cvtr_1_allocated  [in,out] Allocated size of first curvature array
cvtr_1_size  [in,out] Occupied size of first curvature array
cvtr_2  [in,out] Second principal curvatures
cvtr_2_allocated  [in,out] Allocated size of second curvature array
cvtr_2_size  [in,out] Occupied size of second curvature array
err  [out] Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)

void iGeom_getFcCvtrXYZ ( iGeom_Instance  instance,
iBase_EntityHandle  face_handle,
double  x,
double  y,
double  z,
double *  cvtr1_i,
double *  cvtr1_j,
double *  cvtr1_k,
double *  cvtr2_i,
double *  cvtr2_j,
double *  cvtr2_k,
int *  err 
)

Get the two principle curvature vectors for a face at a point.

Get the two principle curvature vectors for a face at a point. Magnitudes of vectors are curvature, directions are directions of principal curvatures.

Parameters:
instance  [in] iGeom instance handle
face_handle  [in] Face being queried
x  [in] Position being queried
y  [in] Position being queried
z  [in] Position being queried
cvtr1_i  [out] Maximum curvature vector
cvtr1_j  [out] Maximum curvature vector
cvtr1_k  [out] Maximum curvature vector
cvtr2_i  [out] Minimum curvature vector
cvtr2_j  [out] Minimum curvature vector
cvtr2_k  [out] Minimum curvature vector
err  [out] Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)
